description: Dashboard for viewing detailed disk information based on S.M.A.R.T data

links.title: S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: Load Cycle Count; Load/Unload Cycle Count

panels.description: Aggregated graph for all types of errors
panels.title: Total Errors

links.title: S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: UltraDMA CRC Error Count

panels.description: Grown defects are drive blocks that have been marked bad once the drive has been in use
panels.title: SAS grown defects

panels.description: Aggregated graph for all types of SAS errors
panels.title: SAS Total Errors

panels.description: SCSI command errors which might be related to bad cable, backplane or card
panels.title: SAS Non-Medium Errors

panels.description: Specifies the counter that contains the total number of blocks for which an uncorrected data error has occurred

targets.expr: label_replace(sum (smartmon_sas_read_uncorrected_errors_count_raw_value{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk" } + smartmon_sas_write_uncorrected_errors_count_raw_value{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk" } + smartmon_sas_verify_uncorrected_errors_count_raw_value{ instance=~"$instance", disk=~"$disk" }) by (instance, disk, name), "instance", "$1", "instance", "([^.]+).*")

panels.title: SAS Uncorrected Errors Total (read/write/verify)

title: S.M.A.R.T Dashboard
